Articles.Content:
If I play the game completely unmodded, the game runs completely smooth, no sudden drop in framerate or freezes whatsoever. If I install just one contract pack, stuttering happens. The more contract pack, the worse the stutter, sometimes reaching half a second freeze every 3-5 seconds. This happens when controlling the vessel outside VAB/SPH. Any idea why and how to fix it?

Edited February 3, 2016 by Algiark
